title: H.E.R., Color Purple, Kris Jenner Engaged, Crate Challenge and more.
itunes:title: H.E.R., Color Purple, Kris Jenner Engaged, Crate Challenge and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Together is how we will get through Tuesday. Why even Ask Bitterman? Oscar winner H.E.R. lands her first major acting role for Warner Bros. We go halfway into the mind of J. Anthony Brown with Smoke Thoughts. The crew share their thoughts on the current events that are happening in our country. A two time NBA Champion is returning to LA and Junior's just bein' a little hateful. Kris Jenner is getting married. Fool #2 likes seeing certain things and is a bit angered over what was decided in TikTok. Today the show wraps up with the hurricane question of the century and the answers will tickle you.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
